name: Uber Gem Smasher
description:
This game uses basic mechanics from Tetris as it will have falling blocks for you to accommodate, but the twist is that the block will break when you make lines of four or more blocks of the same color . There are also boulders that won't break in this way and special blocks with special functionalities.

Credits:

Game development and design by Nicolás Nobza

Music by Javier Castellanos.
